name: Follow the Instructions (GMTKJam 2020)
description:
Follow the Instructions

A short game made during the GMTK Game Jam 2020, with the theme “Out of Control”, in which you are physically out of control. Have fun.

Made with Godot Engine 3.2.2. Every asset was made during the Jam, music included.

How to play:

  • Left click: Pick or Drop a Control Zone
  • Right click: Drop a Control Zone
  • Press on the “Start” button to enable the zones

Known bugs:

  • Conservation of inertia on reset
  • Pick/Drop inconsistencies
